Html:
Hi,

While running Tests/05featuredemo.php I get the following error:

Notice: Object of class PHPExcel_RichText could not be converted to int in Writer\Excel2007\Worksheet.php on line 749

Call Stack
  1. Time Function Location
1 0.0079 {main}( ) ..\05featuredemo.php:0
2 1.5024 PHPExcelWriterExcel2007->save( ) ..\05featuredemo.php:36
3 2.1018 PHPExcelWriterExcel2007_Worksheet->writeWorksheet( ) ..\Excel2007.php:287
4 2.1765 PHPExcelWriterExcel2007Worksheet->writeSheetData( ) ..\Worksheet.php:107
5 2.4189 PHPExcelWriterExcel2007Worksheet->writeCell( ) ..\Worksheet.php:708

What versions do you use?
- PHP version 5. ...?
- PHPExcel version 1. ...?

maartenba wrote:
What versions do you use?
- PHP version 5. ...?
- PHPExcel version 1. ...?


PHPExcel 1.4.5 Production
PHP 5.1.6 on Win32 (I know PHPExcel supposedly requires PHP5.2 but all other Tests run fine. The problem is only with 05featuredemo.php and 07reader.php (both returning the same "Object of class PHPExcel_RichText could not be converted to int in Writer\Excel2007\Worksheet.php on line 749" notice".

Cheers,


Antonio

maartenba wrote:
Can you try PHPExcel 1.5.0 Production?
